trans-unit.source: Step 6: Deploy the XML Request-Reply Bridge
trans-unit.target: Step 6: Deploy the XML Request-Reply Bridge

trans-unit.source: This topic in the tutorial provides instructions on how to deploy the <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: This topic in the tutorial provides instructions on how to deploy the <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: We have already deployed the two relay services to the <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: We have already deployed the two relay services to the <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: To deploy the XML Request-Reply bridge
trans-unit.target: To deploy the XML Request-Reply bridge

trans-unit.source: In <token>vs_current_short</token>, right-click the BizTalk Service solution, and select <embeddedLabel>Build</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: In <token>vs_current_short</token>, right-click the BizTalk Service solution, and select <embeddedLabel>Build</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: After a successful build, right-click the solution name again, and then select <embeddedLabel>Deploy</embeddedLabel> to open the deployment dialog box.
trans-unit.target: After a successful build, right-click the solution name again, and then select <embeddedLabel>Deploy</embeddedLabel> to open the deployment dialog box.

trans-unit.source: Enter the following properties:
trans-unit.target: Enter the following properties:

trans-unit.source: Property Name
trans-unit.target: Property Name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Deployment Endpoint
trans-unit.target: Deployment Endpoint

trans-unit.source: A read-only field that displays the BizTalk Service URL and the default namespace specified in <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: A read-only field that displays the BizTalk Service URL and the default namespace specified in <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: Acs Namespace
trans-unit.target: Acs Namespace

trans-unit.source: Enter the Access Control namespace for <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: Enter the Access Control namespace for <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: Issuer Name
trans-unit.target: Issuer Name

trans-unit.source: Enter the username who is the owner of the service namespace you specified, or has manage claims to the namespace.
trans-unit.target: Enter the username who is the owner of the service namespace you specified, or has manage claims to the namespace.

trans-unit.source: This property is required to authenticate the identity of the user to the <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: This property is required to authenticate the identity of the user to the <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: Shared Secret
trans-unit.target: Shared Secret

trans-unit.source: Enter the secret key for authentication of the service namespace owner.
trans-unit.target: Enter the secret key for authentication of the service namespace owner.

trans-unit.source: Select <embeddedLabel>Deploy</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Select <embeddedLabel>Deploy</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>vs_current_short</token> Output pane displays the deployment progress and result.
trans-unit.target: The <token>vs_current_short</token> Output pane displays the deployment progress and result.

trans-unit.source: The URL where the <token>xml_bridge</token> is deployed is also displayed in the Output pane.
trans-unit.target: The URL where the <token>xml_bridge</token> is deployed is also displayed in the Output pane.
